settings.text: We engage in charitable work where we raise funds for the education of children and youth in impoverished countries. Our aim is to assist those in need, including orphans and widows, while maintaining a moral and "unblemished" life. We support children in parts of East Africa by providing them with necessary assistance and care, among other things.

settings.heading: WHY
settings.text:
The mind is a terrible thing to waste. Thousands of children in Eritrea and Ethiopia drop out of school each year simply because their parents cannot afford to cover tuition and school-related costs.

The hopeful news is that together, WE can help create a new start for these children. WE can mobilize a life-changing surge of love and support by providing scholarships. These scholarships will ensure that children stay in school, covering tuition and related school expenses.

settings.heading: LOVE IN ACTION
settings.text:
Love in action means imitating Jesus Christ. Jesus cared deeply for the poor and oppressed, and showed his compassion in concrete ways. By serving others and giving what we have, we can imitate Jesus’ love and care for all. Let’s show love in action and spread hope to children in need. We support others as an expression of our faith, as a tangible way to show God’s love for them in their lives. We will intervene in situations we see and imitate God’s love completely in all situations to which God leads us. Let's give freely and live fully in God’s grace.

Give into a child's future.

settings.heading: HOW DOES IT PLAY OUT
settings.text: Supporting children is an expression of faith, a tangible way of showing God’s love for them in their lives, and a desire to show this love to children in need. This will not only help the children go to school but also enable their parents or guardians to save the money they could have spent on schooling items and use it for other essential needs, like food.
